name: Surviving Soldier
description:
A wounded soldier is trying to get out of the line of fire. Opponents fire non-stop mortars. Pick up first-aid kits and regenerate health to get to your own. No matter how badly the body suffers, if the head is injured, death is inevitable.

Surviving Soldier - Platform runner with arcade elements. In this game, you need to help a soldier get to his own. The enemy does not sleep and conducts pinpoint shelling. Try not to hit your head, it will be fatal to you. The wound is serious and shakes from side to side, find a balance and reach the end.

Game Features:
- Physical World
- Difficulty
- Music
- Pixel Art
